summary.span: 命名空间包含在基于 Windows 的应用程序中支持访问 Microsoft Ajax 身份验证、角色和配置文件服务的客户端服务提供程序以及其他类。

span.span: The namespace contains client service providers and other classes that support access in Windows-based applications to the Microsoft Ajax authentication, roles, and profile services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的类命名空间包括客户端应用程序服务提供程序使基于 Windows 的应用程序能够使用[!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)]身份验证、 角色和配置文件服务。The classes in the namespace include client application service providers that enable Windows-based applications to use the [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)] authentication, roles, and profile services. 可以启用这些服务和在应用程序配置文件中，指定客户端服务提供程序，然后访问这些服务通过现有[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]成员身份、 标识和应用程序设置基础结构。You can enable these services and specify client service providers in your application configuration file, and then access the services through existing [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] membership, identity, and application settings infrastructures. 客户端服务提供程序还支持偶尔连接的存储和检索本地数据缓存中的用户信息时应用程序处于脱机状态。The client service providers also support occasional connectivity by storing and retrieving user information in a local data cache when the application is offline. 有关详细信息，请参阅[客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/client-application-services.md). 若要访问登录服务，可以使用 Windows 或 Forms 身份验证通过指定或在应用程序配置。To access the login service, you can use either Windows or Forms authentication by specifying the or in your application configuration. Windows 身份验证使用用户登录到操作系统时提供的标识。Windows authentication uses the identity supplied when a user logs in to the operating system. 窗体身份验证要求你从用户检索登录信息并将其传递给该服务。Forms authentication requires that you to retrieve login information from the user and pass it to the service. 您可以执行此操作通过指定实现，使用你配置。You can do this by specifying an implementation with your configuration. 方法将返回对象，其中包含用户登录信息。The method returns a object that contains user login information. 您可以使用此对象，例如，填充通过显示登录对话框中的方法。You can populate this object, for example, by displaying a login dialog box in the method. 若要访问的角色和配置文件服务，请指定和在应用程序配置。To access the roles and profile services, specify the and in your application configuration.
